diagrams.description: A flowchart showing the fundamental concepts and structure of User Interface (UI).
diagrams.mermaid_code:
flowchart TD UI[User Interface UI] --> VisualDesign[Visual Design Principles] UI --> Components[UI Components Library] UI --> Layout[Layout & Structure] UI --> Patterns[Design Patterns & Systems] UI --> Principles[UI Design Principles] UI --> Tools[UI Design Tools] UI --> Development[UI Development] VisualDesign --> Typography[Typography
Fonts & Hierarchy] VisualDesign --> Color[Color Theory
Palettes & Contrast] VisualDesign --> Icons[Icons & Imagery
Visual Language] VisualDesign --> Spacing[Spacing & Grid
8pt Grid System] VisualDesign --> Motion[Motion Design
Animations & Transitions] Components --> Buttons[Buttons
Primary, Secondary, CTA] Components --> Forms[Forms & Inputs
Text Fields, Dropdowns] Components --> Navigation[Navigation Elements
Menus, Breadcrumbs] Components --> Cards[Cards & Containers
Content Blocks] Components --> Modals[Modals & Dialogs
Overlays & Popups] Components --> Feedback[Feedback Components
Alerts, Toasts, Progress] Layout --> Responsive[Responsive Design
Mobile-First Approach] Layout --> Grid[Grid Systems
12-Column, Flexbox] Layout --> Composition[Composition
Visual Hierarchy] Layout --> Breakpoints[Breakpoints
Media Queries] Patterns --> Material[Material Design
Google's Design System] Patterns --> Flat[Flat Design
Minimalist Approach] Patterns --> DesignSystems[Design Systems
Component Libraries] Patterns --> Atomic[Atomic Design
Atoms, Molecules, Organisms] Principles --> Consistency[Consistency
Visual & Behavioral] Principles --> Clarity[Clarity
Clear Communication] Principles --> Feedback[Feedback
User Actions Response] Principles --> Efficiency[Efficiency
Streamlined Interactions] Tools --> Figma[Figma & Adobe XD
Design Tools] Tools --> Sketch[Sketch
Mac Design Tool] Tools --> InVision[InVision & Framer
Prototyping] Development --> HTML[HTML & CSS
Structure & Styling] Development --> Frameworks[UI Frameworks
React, Vue, Angular] Development --> CSS[CSS Preprocessors
SASS, LESS]
